category.title: General
category.item: The CustomPoints plugin allows you to define a custom points rule for the "Rounds"-GameMode. You can select a preset of predefined preset or set your own custom points rule.

category.title: How to...
category.item: To define a custom point rule, just insert the point values for each ranking place from the first to the last, seperated by comma. To finnally save that custom-rule, hit the submit-button.
